name: Paddle
plugin_instructions:
1. Register a Paddle Sandbox Account for testing. (https://sandbox-vendors.paddle.com)

2. Go to Paddle -> Developer Tools -> Authentication then Generate a "Client-side tokens"

3. Go to your Bubble Plugin Page and insert the "Client-side tokens" where requested

4. Place your Paddle element and you're ready to go!
